title: I lost my i-130 how can i find out the day it was recieved
question: i went to my finale appt. for my immigration status,and they said i need proof of when i filed my i-130.I lost the i-130 paper what can i do
answers:
Do you have your A#? You might to do a FOIA request but it takes a long time to get an answer. The FOIA will pull a copy of your file from immigration. It will be good to have an attorney look at your case before you even file for the FOIA

Good Luck
Shah Peerally Founder and Managing Attorney of Shah Peerally Law Group PC
